mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `b_mail_remind` (gmt_create, gmt_modify, code, mail, title, content, send_date, service_order_id, visa_id, commission_order_id, adviser_id, offcial_id, user_id, kj_id ) VALUES ( NOW(), NOW(), #{code}, #{mail}, #{title}, #{content}, #{sendDate}, #{serviceOrderId}, #{visaId}, #{commissionOrderId}, #{adviserId}, #{offcialId}, #{userId}, #{kjId} );
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, code , mail, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, visa_id AS visaId, commission_order_id AS commissionOrderId, adviser_id AS adviserId, offcial_id AS offcialId, kj_id AS kjId, user_id AS userId from b_mail_remind WHERE id = #{id};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, code , mail, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, visa_id AS visaId, commission_order_id AS commissionOrderId, adviser_id AS adviserId, offcial_id AS offcialId, kj_id AS kjId, user_id AS userId FROM b_mail_remind WHERE is_send = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(send_date,'%Y%m%d-%H') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d-%H')
AND DATE_FORMAT(send_date,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') AND offcial_id IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY send_date ASC;
